actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to permit mentally retarded individuals and other disabled persons to deduct work-related expenses in determining their income for supplemental security income benefit purposes, in the same way as is presently permitted for the blind.

summary.text: Amends Title XVI (Supplemental Security Income for the Aged, Blind, and Disabled) of the Social Security Act to exclude work-related expenses of mentally retarded individuals in determining their income for supplemental security income benefit purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to permit mentally retarded individuals and other disabled persons to deduct work-related expenses in determining their income for supplemental security income benefit purposes, in the same way as is presently permitted for the blind.
